extendedInfo.description: Former #1 iPhone and iPad Game in Switzerland "Grooh" is now available on Android!Grooh is a cute (and lazy?) monster that loves pineapples.Today, Grooh decides to explore the abandoned "Feilong Castle". There's a huge dragon printed on the entrance door!! But most importantly, rumors say that there's a secret treasure hidden there, and *who knows*, maybe it's full of pineapples?That's why you, oh mighty player, should help Grooh to find the treasure!ââââââââââââKEY FEATURESâ Smooth and intuitive controls using the Touch Screen interfaceâ Beautiful graphics and detailed animationsâ Use boxes, teleporters, slide over ice and walk on explosive fields to unlock every roomâ Collect gold medals and improve Grooh's statisticsâ Explore 119 challenging roomsâ¦â â¦and discover a crazy final twist!â Grooh!!ââââââââââââINFOYoutube Video: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WlZJPMC3NhQVisit Grooh: http://grooh.digidingo.comLike Grooh: https://www.facebook.com/pages/Grooh/215057458579140Follow Grooh: https://twitter.com/#!/digiDingo

reviews.title: Fun and unique puzzle game
reviews.comment: The game itself is great, interesting puzzle game that requires you to think not just tap the screen repeatedly.  It would be a five star game if you could make it more stable as it seems to crash often. Also please add a \"replay level\" option once a level is complete to make it easier to try for a better score. Good work guys!
reviews.author: chickenjetlag

reviews.title: Game over
reviews.comment: Just completed the game, 120 levels, 120 gold medals, excellent game, OK did crash on the odd occasion, but worth carrying on. Hope to see more levels for android in the future.
reviews.author: Eric Cook

reviews.title: Crashes on loadingrr
reviews.comment: Cant get game to load on Archos Arnova 10 G2
reviews.author: Colin Harris

reviews.title: Cute
reviews.comment: Very cute. The character and nice 3D graphics make it more interesting than a typical puzzle game. I wish there were some new elements to the game in later levels, to keep it interesting. Instead it\'s just the same but harder. Losing interest a bit.
reviews.author: govegg K

reviews.title: Background process keeps crashing
reviews.comment: Apparently,  when not playing the game, it\'s still running a service in the background \'cos I get Grooh crash error messages at least once everyday. Don\'t want a background process taking up resources, nor annoying error messages. It isn\'t that much fun either.
reviews.author: Joan Bos

reviews.title: Uninstalling
reviews.comment: Installed a few days ago but never had a chance to try it. However must of been 3 updates at nearly 50Mb a time for as the developer says \'minor bugfixes\'. Would rather uninstall than waste monthly allowance on one game.
reviews.author: Mick Collingwood

reviews.title: D-pad sucks
reviews.comment: The only challenge of this game is getting the copycat of Totoro to move were you want it instead of where it freakin\' wants. Uninstalled after playing level 1
reviews.author: Juli\303\241n Real

reviews.title: App of the day - 4 STARS
reviews.comment: Played well until the level with boxes, can lift, drop and push blocks. PLEASE NOTE: Blocks only go in holes. The game doesn\'t make that clear. Thanks for the previous reply digi.
reviews.author: Tess Jay

reviews.title: does not work
reviews.comment: When I turn the game on all I get is a black screen
reviews.author: bbwoman2d

reviews.title: Has major issue.... freezes out the phone, completely
reviews.comment: I have tried the 3rd time will have to uninstall the game. On the first try, it turned completely black screen and couldn\'t get out... couldn\'t reset either... I had to removed the battery to restart the phone. On the second try, I opened the app... it froze my screen again. On the third try, it loaded to the start screen. When I hit the start screen... I froze again.... WHAT THE....??! I give up. I\'\'ve just removed my battery for hard shutdown again.... Come on, now. This game has been out for sometimes already, right?! How can you not get it fixed this critical issue?
reviews.author: ANTONY ND

reviews.title: Great puzzle solving
reviews.comment: Game eases u in nicely, rarely is difficult to complete (maybe not so to get gold later on I hope). Text is annoyingrrr to readgrrr. It gets frustratingrr when yourrr eyes cant skim readgrr pointless textgrr. It does notgrr addgrr to the moodgrr its just ANNOYINGRRRRRRRRRR.
reviews.author: Jason Wain

reviews.title: Nothing to see
reviews.comment: Slow, bad command not very exciting or challenging.
reviews.author: Arnaud Guillemot

reviews.title: Game
reviews.comment: It\'s a good game...  But I\'d like to have another character to choose.  It\'s a little slow and isn\'t very precise when you move it...  But in general it\'s a good game.
reviews.author: Ricardo Rangel

reviews.title: Must be optimised
reviews.comment: Played on my iPad 4 at first. I uninstalled as soon as I found out that it is available for android so that I could play it on my phone. The game is good with good puzzles and it has hours of fun. On the negative side however is the awful loading time coz it has to load ads with the game n gameplay is kinda slow when compared to iOS version. Plz optimise the app and reduce the loading time.
reviews.author: Abijith Felix

reviews.title: Samsung galaxy note n7000
reviews.comment: It works amazing doesn\'t move slow at all ppl can\'t complain about this if anyone is having trouble it means they got a crappie phone would get 5 stars if u add more levels should be alot more levels like alot
reviews.author: Felicia Leefai
